src:
Partija karijere Vase Micića uništila Olimpijakos u Pireju!
Fenomenalno izdanje srpskog plejmejkera

07 Nov 2019

Srpski plejmejker Vasilije Micić igra košarku života ove sezone! Bio je MVP meseca oktobra u Evroligi, a i večeras je pokazao da je u strašnoj formi.
Posle kritika trenera Ergina Atamana za nešto slabiju utaikmicu u prošlom kolu protiv Panatinaikosa, Vasa se večeras vratio u Grčku i predstavio se u vanserijskom izdanju. Uništio je Olimpijakos u Pireju! Efes je rasturio grčkog velikana 86:67 uz 27 poena srpskog reprezentativca. Nedavno je protiv Zvezde sa 26 poena ostvario rekord karijere, a večeras ga je nadmašio. Meč je završio sa indeksom uspešnosti od  27.
Od početka je Micić najavio da će ovo biti njegovo veće. Ubacio je osam od prvih 10 poena Efesa, ukupno 10 za prvu četvrtinu koju su Grci rešili u svoju korist. A onda je usledila strašna druga četvrtina koju je Efes dobio 32:11!  Micić je u tom periodu ubacio još devet poena i na poluvremenu imao ukupno 19. Sjajan je u bio i Šejn Larkin koji je u drugoj četvrtini ubacio 12 poena. Olimpijakos nije imao rešenje za bekove Efesa...
Posle 18 poena prednosti na poluvremenu, Efes je rutinski do kraja kontrolisao utakmicu. Iako je Olimpijakos u jednom trenutku uspeo da spusti zaostatak ispod 10 razlike, Efes je novom serijom i trojkama Micića i Larkina opet stekao ogromnu prednost koja je na kraju iznosila rekordnih 19 razlike.
Efes je šutirao trojke iznad 50 odsto i imao sjajnih 12/22 van linije 6,75, dok je Oli pogodio samo 8 od 29 šutnutih trojki. Micić je svih 27 poena postigao iz igre. Dvojke je šutirao 6/9, a trojke fenomenalnih 5/6! Upisao je i pet asistencija. Larkin je bio takođe fantastičan sa 24 poena (4/5 za dva, 3/3 za tri, 7/9 sa penala) i šest skokova. Za ukupan indeks 31! Danston i Boboa su dodali po 10 poena. Kod Olimpijakosa je jedina svetla tačka bio Nikola Milutinov sa 10 poena i bez promašaja (5/5 za dva) uz čak 13 skokova. Pol sa 15 i Printezis sa 14 poena su bili efikasniji ali uz slabe procente šuta.

EVROLIGA - 7. KOLO:


Četvrtak

Zenit - Himki 73:87/Holins 25 - Buker 20/
Crvena zvezda - Real Madrid 60:75/Beron 17 - Ljulj 16/
Olimpijakos - Efes 67:86/Pol 15, Milutinov 10 - Micić 27/
Makabi - Alba 104:78/Dibartolomeo 19 - Siva 14/20.45:  (1,70) Olimpija Milano (14,50)  Baskonija (2,30) 

Petak



18.45:  (1,25) Fenerbahče  (17,00)  Bajern (4,40) 

19.00:  (2,55) Žalgiris  (14,50)  Barselona (1,60) 

20.30:  (1,25) Panatinaikos  (17,00)  Valensija (4,40) 

20.45:  (3,90) ASVEL  (16,00) CSKA (1,30) 


NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Your Micic's Career Party Destroyed Olympiakos in Piraeus!
A phenomenal release by a Serbian playmaker

07 Nov 2019

Serbian playmaker Vasilije Micic is playing basketball of a lifetime this season! He was MVP of the month of October in the Euroleague, and tonight he showed that he is in terrible shape.
After criticizing coach Ergin Ataman for a slightly weaker fixture in the last round against Panathinaikos, Vasa returned to Greece tonight and introduced himself in an extra-ordinary edition. Destroyed Olympiakos in Piraeus! Ephes blasted the Greek giant 86-67 with 27 points for the Serbian national team. He recently made a career record against the Star with 26 points and topped it tonight. The match ended with a performance index of 27.
From the beginning, Micic announced that this would be his bigger one. He scored eight of the first 10 points of Ephesus, a total of 10 for the first quarter settled by the Greeks in their favor. And then came the terrible second quarter that Ephesus got 32:11! Micic scored nine more points during the period and scored 19 at halftime. Shane Larkin was also great, scoring 12 points in the second quarter. Olympiakos had no solution for the Ephesus escape ...
After an 18-point halftime lead, Ephesus routinely controlled the game. Although Olympiakos managed to lower the gap below 10 points at one point, Ephesus again gained a huge advantage with the new series and the triplets of Micić and Larkin, which eventually amounted to a record 19 differences.
Ephes kicked threes above 50 percent and had a great 12/22 off the 6.75 line, while Oli hit just 8 of 29 shot threes. Micic scored all 27 points from the game. The doubles kicked 6/9, and the trophies a phenomenal 5/6! He also tallied five assists. Larkin was also fantastic with 24 points (4/5 for two, 3/3 for three, 7/9 from penalties) and six rebounds. For a total index of 31! Danston and Boboa each added 10 points each. At Olympiakos Nikola Milutinov was the only bright spot with 10 points and no errors (5/5 for two) with 13 rebounds. Paul with 15 and Printezis with 14 points were more efficient but with weak shot percentages.

EUROLEAGUE - ROUND 7


Thursday

Zenit - Khimki 73: 87 / Hollins 25 - Booker 20 /
Red Star Real Madrid 60: 75 / Beron 17 - Feb 16 /
